plot: A re-titled, separately re-released episode from the 1920 serial, The $1,000,000 Reward, directed by George A. Lessey, and starring Lillian Walker and Coit Albertson.
title: Serum of Evil
plot_es: A re-titled, separately re-released episode from the 1920 serial, The $1,000,000 Reward, directed by George A. Lessey, and starring Lillian Walker and Coit Albertson.
